adjectives.description: comfortless (comparative more comfortless, superlative most comfortless)

entries.meaning: (of a person) Deprived of comfort; uncomforted.
examples: The hope I dreamed of was a dream,
Was but a dream; and now I wake,
Exceeding comfortless, and worn, and old,

entries.meaning: (of a thing) Offering no comfort; uncomforting.
examples: In comfortless, damp blankets we got through the night.
